uint32_t CCR; 00313 uint32_t RESERVED1; 00314 __IO uint32_t SHP[2]; 00315 __IO uint32_t SHCSR; 00316 } SCB_Type; 00317 00318 /* SCB CPUID Register Definitions */ 00319 #define SCB_CPUID_IMPLEMENTER_Pos 24 00320 #define SCB_CPUID_IMPLEMENTER_Msk (0xFFUL << SCB_CPUID_IMPLEMENTER_Pos) 00322 #define SCB_CPUID_VARIANT_Pos 20 00323 #define SCB_CPUID_VARIANT_Msk (0xFUL << SCB_CPUID_VARIANT_Pos) 00325 #define SCB_CPUID_ARCHITECTURE_Pos 16 00326 #define SCB_CPUID_ARCHITECTURE_Msk (0xFUL << SCB_CPUID_ARCHITECTURE_Pos) 00328 #define SCB_CPUID_PARTNO_Pos 4 00329 #define State Register Definitions */ 00335 #define SCB_ICSR_NMIPENDSET_Pos 31 00336 #define SCB_ICSR_NMIPENDSET_Msk (1UL << SCB_ICSR_NMIPENDSET_Pos) 00338 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSVSET_Pos 28 00339 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSVSET_Msk (1UL << SCB_ICSR_PENDSVSET_Pos) 00341 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSVCLR_Pos 27 00342 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSVCLR_Msk (1UL << SCB_ICSR_PENDSVCLR_Pos) 00344 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSTSET_Pos 26 00345 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSTSET_Msk (1UL << SCB_ICSR_PENDSTSET_Pos) 00347 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSTCLR_Pos 25 00348 #define SCB_ICSR_PENDSTCLR_Msk (1UL << SCB_ICSR_PENDSTCLR_Pos) 00350 #define SCB_ICSR_ISRPREEMPT_Pos 23 00351 #define SCB_ICSR_ISRPREEMPT_Msk (1UL << SCB_ICSR_ISRPREEMPT_Pos) 00353 #define SCB_ICSR_ISRPENDING_Pos 22 00354 #define SCB_ICSR_ISRPENDING_Msk (1UL << SCB_ICSR_ISRPENDING_Pos) 00356 #define SCB_ICSR_VECTPENDING_Pos 12 00357 #define SCB_ICSR_VECTPENDING_Msk (0x1FFUL << SCB_ICSR_VECTPENDING_Pos) 00359 #define SCB_ICSR_VECTACTIVE_Pos 0 00360 #define SCB_ICSR_VECTACTIVE_Msk (0x1FFUL << SCB_ICSR_VECTACTIVE_Pos) 00362 /* SCB Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register Definitions */ 00363 #define SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEY_Pos 16 00364 #define SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEY_Msk (0xFFFFUL << SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEY_Pos) 00366 #define SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEYSTAT_Pos 16 00367 #define SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEYSTAT_Msk (0xFFFFUL << SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEYSTAT_Pos) 00369 #define SCB_AIRCR_ENDIANESS_Pos 15 00370 #define SCB_AIRCR_ENDIANESS_Msk (1UL << SCB_AIRCR_ENDIANESS_Pos) 00372 #define SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_Pos 2 00373 #define SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_Msk (1UL << SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_Pos) 00375 #define SCB_AIRCR_VECTCLRACTIVE_Pos 1 00376 #define SCB_AIRCR_VECTCLRACTIVE_Msk (1UL << SCB_AIRCR_VECTCLRACTIVE_Pos) 00378 /* SCB System Control Register Definitions */ 00379 #define SCB_SCR_SEVONPEND_Pos 4 00380 #define SCB_SCR_SEVONPEND_Msk (1UL << SCB_SCR_SEVONPEND_Pos) 00382 #define SCB_SCR_SLEEPDEEP_Pos 2 00383 #define SCB_SCR_SLEEPDEEP_Msk (1UL << SCB_SCR_SLEEPDEEP_Pos) 00385 #define SCB_SCR_SLEEPONEXIT_Pos 1 00386 #define SCB_SCR_SLEEPONEXIT_Msk (1UL << SCB_SCR_SLEEPONEXIT_Pos) 00388 /* SCB Configuration Control Register Definitions */ 00389 #define SCB_CCR_STKALIGN_Pos 9 00390 #define SCB_CCR_STKALIGN_Msk (1UL << SCB_CCR_STKALIGN_Pos) 00392 #define SCB_CCR_UNALIGN_TRP_Pos 3 00393 #define SCB_CCR_UNALIGN_TRP_Msk (1UL << SCB_CCR_UNALIGN_TRP_Pos) 00395 /* SCB System Handler Control and State Register Definitions */ 00396 #define SCB_SHCSR_SVCALLPENDED_Pos 15 00397 #define SCB_SHCSR_SVCALLPENDED_Msk (1UL << SCB_SHCSR_SVCALLPENDED_Pos) 00410 typedef struct 00411 { 00412 __IO uint32_t CTRL; 00413 __IO uint32_t LOAD; 00414 __IO uint32_t VAL; 00415 __I uint32_t CALIB; 00416 } SysTick_Type; 00417 00418 /* SysTick Control / Status Register Definitions */ 00419 #define SysTick_CTRL_COUNTFLAG_Pos 16 00420 #define SysTick_CTRL_COUNTFLAG_Msk (1UL << SysTick_CTRL_COUNTFLAG_Pos) 00422 #define SysTick_CTRL_CLKSOURCE_Pos 2 00423 #define SysTick_CTRL_CLKSOURCE_Msk (1UL << SysTick_CTRL_CLKSOURCE_Pos) 00425 #define SysTick_CTRL_TICKINT_Pos 1 00426 #define SysTick_CTRL_TICKINT_Msk (1UL << SysTick_CTRL_TICKINT_Pos) 00428 #define SysTick_CTRL_ENABLE_Pos 0 00429 #define SysTick_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk (1UL << SysTick_CTRL_ENABLE_Pos) 00431 /* SysTick Reload Register Definitions */ 00432 #define SysTick_LOAD_RELOAD_Pos 0 00433 #define SysTick_LOAD_RELOAD_Msk (0xFFFFFFUL << SysTick_LOAD_RELOAD_Pos) 00435 /* SysTick Current Register Definitions */ 00436 #define SysTick_VAL_CURRENT_Pos 0 00437 #define SysTick_VAL_CURRENT_Msk (0xFFFFFFUL << SysTick_VAL_CURRENT_Pos) 00439 /* SysTick Calibration Register Definitions */ 00440 #define SysTick_CALIB_NOREF_Pos 31 00441 #define SysTick_CALIB_NOREF_Msk (1UL << SysTick_CALIB_NOREF_Pos) 00443 #define SysTick_CALIB_SKEW_Pos 30 00444 #define SysTick_CALIB_SKEW_Msk (1UL << SysTick_CALIB_SKEW_Pos) 00446 #define SysTick_CALIB_TENMS_Pos 0 00447 #define SysTick_CALIB_TENMS_Msk (0xFFFFFFUL << SysTick_VAL_CURRENT_Pos) 00468 /* Memory mapping of Cortex-M0 Hardware */ 00469 #define SCS_BASE (0xE000E000UL) 00470 #define SysTick_BASE (SCS_BASE + 0x0010UL) 00471 #define NVIC_BASE (SCS_BASE + 0x0100UL) 00472 #define SCB_BASE (SCS_BASE + 0x0D00UL) 00474 #define SCB ((SCB_Type *) SCB_BASE ) 00475 #define SysTick ((SysTick_Type *) SysTick_BASE ) 00476 #define NVIC ((NVIC_Type *) NVIC_BASE ) 00483 /******************************************************************************* 00484 * Hardware Abstraction Layer 00485 Core Function Interface contains: 00486 - Core NVIC Functions 00487 - Core SysTick Functions 00488 - Core Register Access Functions 00489 ******************************************************************************/ 00495 /* ########################## NVIC functions #################################### */ 00502 /* Interrupt Priorities are WORD accessible only under ARMv6M */ 00503 /* The following MACROS handle generation of the register offset and byte masks */ 00504 #define _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ( (((uint32_t)(IRQn) ) & 0x03) * 8 ) 00505 #define _SHP_IDX(IRQn) ( ((((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x0F)-8) >> 2) ) 00506 #define _IP_IDX(IRQn) ( ((uint32_t)(IRQn) >> 2) ) 00507 00508 00515 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_EnableIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00516 { 00517 NVIC->ISER[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); 00518 } 00519 00520 00527 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_DisableIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00528 { 00529 NVIC->ICER[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); 00530 } 00531 00532 00543 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t NVIC_GetPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00544 { 00545 return((uint32_t) ((NVIC->ISPR[0] & (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)))?1:0)); 00546 } 00547 00548 00555 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_SetPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00556 { 00557 NVIC->ISPR[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); 00558 } 00559 00560 00567 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00568 { 00569 NVIC->ICPR[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); /* Clear pending interrupt */ 00570 } 00571 00572 00582 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_SetPriority(IRQn_Type IRQn, uint32_t priority) 00583 { 00584 if(IRQn < 0) { 00585 SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] = (SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] & ~(0xFF << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))) | 00586 (((priority << (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) & 0xFF) << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn)); } 00587 else { 00588 NVIC->IP[_IP_IDX(IRQn)] = (NVIC->IP[_IP_IDX(IRQn)] & ~(0xFF << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))) | 00589 (((priority << (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) & 0xFF) << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn)); } 00590 } 00591 00592 00604 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t NVIC_GetPriority(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00605 { 00606 00607 if(IRQn < 0) { 00608 return((uint32_t)(((SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] >> _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ) & 0xFF) >> (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS))); } /* get priority for Cortex-M0 system interrupts */ 00609 else { 00610 return((uint32_t)(((NVIC->IP[ _IP_IDX(IRQn)] >> _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ) & 0xFF) >> (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS))); } /* get priority for device specific interrupts */ 00611 } 00612 00613 00618 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_SystemReset(void) 00619 { 00620 __DSB(); /* Ensure all outstanding memory accesses included 00621 buffered write are completed before reset */ 00622 SCB->AIRCR = ((0x5FA << SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEY_Pos) | 00623 SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_Msk); 00624 __DSB(); /* Ensure completion of memory access */ 00625 while(1); /* wait until reset */ 00626 } 00627 00632 /* ################################## SysTick function ############################################ */ 00639 #if (__Vendor_SysTickConfig == 0) 00640 00656 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t SysTick_Config(uint32_t ticks) 00657 { 00658 if ((ticks - 1) > SysTick_LOAD_RELOAD_Msk) return (1); /* Reload value impossible */ 00659 00660 SysTick->LOAD = ticks - 1; /* set reload register */ 00661 NVIC_SetPriority (SysTick_IRQn, (1<<__NVIC_PRIO_BITS) - 1); /* set Priority for Systick Interrupt */ 00662 SysTick->VAL = 0; /* Load the SysTick Counter Value */ 00663 SysTick->CTRL = SysTick_CTRL_CLKSOURCE_Msk | 00664 SysTick_CTRL_TICKINT_Msk | 00665 SysTick_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk; /* Enable SysTick IRQ and SysTick Timer */ 00666 return (0); /* Function successful */ 00667 } 00668 00669 #endif 00670 00676 #endif /* __CORE_CM0_H_DEPENDANT */ 00677 00678 #endif /* __CMSIS_GENERIC */ 00679 00680 #ifdef __cplusplus 00681 } 00682 #endif
